DOC.brief_title: Computerized Health Education Promote Physical Activity
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective study determine , via 6-month randomized control study , efficacy provide tailored physical activity computer report patient physician . The primary outcome minute physical activity measure 7-Day Physical Activity Recall interview 6 month . The intervention group complete physical activity survey baseline , 1 , 3 , 6 month . Based response , participant receive four feedback report time point . The report aim motivate participant increase physical activity , personalize participant ' need ; also include activity prescription . The control group receive identical procedure , except receive general report preventive screen base response preventive screening question .
